title: Camera crashes the app: An error occured while executing doInBackground()
body:
# Problem

`java.lang.RuntimeException: An error occured while executing doInBackground()`

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/63245453-e6700880-c268-11e9-8691-4041fa47f815.png)

```
2019-08-19 10:02:04.657 25083-31983/? E/AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: AsyncTask #12
    Process: im.status.ethereum.pr, PID: 25083
    java.lang.RuntimeException: An error occurred while executing doInBackground()
        at android.os.AsyncTask$3.done(AsyncTask.java:365)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.finishCompletion(FutureTask.java:383)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.setException(FutureTask.java:252)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:271)
        at android.os.AsyncTask$SerialExecutor$1.run(AsyncTask.java:257)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1162)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:636)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:784)
     Caused by: java.lang.Exception
        at com.lwansbrough.RCTCamera.RCTCameraViewFinder$ReaderAsyncTask.doInBackground(RCTCameraViewFinder.java:388)
        at com.lwansbrough.RCTCamera.RCTCameraViewFinder$ReaderAsyncTask.doInBackground(RCTCameraViewFinder.java:326)
        at android.os.AsyncTask$2.call(AsyncTask.java:345)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266)
        at android.os.AsyncTask$SerialExecutor$1.run(AsyncTask.java:257) 
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1162) 
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:636) 
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:784) 
```

## Steps:

1. open status
2. open wallet
3. select status account -> send -> specify recipient -> scan QR code -> allow permission to camera

NOTE: happens everywhere where camera is involved, for example scanning contact code, scanning wallet code.

**Reproduced on Android 7 and 8 in nightly build**

After i tap Exit and reopen the app:
